title: Test Tags System
description: Testing the automatic tag processing and MCP documentation system
author: Test Author

body.raw:
# Test Tags System

This post is created to test the automatic tag processing system and verify that MCP documentation is updated accordingly.

## Features Being Tested

- Tag processing
- MCP documentation updates
- SEO regeneration
- RSS feed updates

The system should automatically detect this new post and update all relevant documentation.
